title: Good Omens animatic - Scarboroughfair (fic: Pray for us, Icarus)
author: Pinkpiggy 93
comment: An animatic that's out of watercolor?

me : has read Pray For Us, Icarus
me : knows damn well this is gonna hurt
also me : haha okay let's watch this I bet it'll be fine
The ethereal feeling that comes from listening to this music and watching the wonderful art pass by. Just wow. Can you hear my heart breaking

The different colours you used throughout this video is wonderful as it conveys the emotions and the current setting. Your artstyle has always been so pleasing to look at. But I think this is the best I have seen so far. The storyline pairs so well with the music that you have chosen so its just perfect. It's amazing how much details and expression you put into everything and I love it so much. You're fantastic at what you do ^_^
description:
This was a project that started from a Good Omens fanfic by seaskystone on tumblr
the series has 7 parts and this is part 3.
I made a comic on part 1
